turns.text: Hello. How can I help you?
turns.zh: Hello. How can I help you?

turns.text: Sure. How many do you need?
turns.zh: Sure. How many do you need?

turns.text: No problem. What’s your room number?
turns.zh: No problem. What’s your room number?

turns.text: We can send them in 10 minutes.
turns.zh: We can send them in 10 minutes.

turns.text: Is there anything else you need?
turns.zh: Is there anything else you need?

turns.text: Great. We’ll send them right away.
turns.zh: Great. We’ll send them right away.
